channel.title: Really Confused on Creating Server etc
channel.description:
Hi Guys :) Or Gals ;)
I really want to create a rs server like silab's server: shockerscape.no-ip.biz
I want to be able to have an area for skillz, shops, wilderness, pking and a train area.
I have looked into setting up a private server and it is all working and that, I used Noobscape. Now I was wondering whether i could develop that to what i want it to be,
Any questions plz ask!!
Thanks

item.title: Really Confused on Creating Server etc
item.dc:creator: @ufearmyskils ufearmyskils
item.description:
@ufearmyskils wrote:

Are you just adding npcs, shops etc… or like pking areas, skilling area with teleports?

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html ----------

–Topics–
Spawning NPCs
Deleting Global Objects
Spawning Global Objects
Editing Items Bonuses
Making Working Portals
Making Working Shops
Opening .cfg Files
NPC movement
Changing the initial spawn point

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,355213.0.html ------ tells you how to create a funpk

just a couple tuts that might be helpful

Read full topic
